author: husted
msg: WW-1562 Apply patch submitted by Musachy Barros. Fixed on this patch:

author: danielf
msg: Starting to move generators, transformers, serializers, readers and sources that can be used in a pipeline without needing a sitemap, to cocoon-pipeline-components. Their dependencies are also moved when needed.
* I needed to factor out part of the SourceUtil to a new class as the SourceUtil depends on sitemap specific classes.
* xpointer and xslt components are moved to cocoon-pipeline-components
* Abstract sitemap component classes are moved to cocoon-pipeline-impl
* I didn't move the CIncludeTransformer, I18nTransformer and Includetransformer as their dependencies is more complicated and need more though.
* Configuration files and tests are not moved yet.
This is an empty revision for padding.
